0: I'm feelin' like I'm losin' my mind, I'm walkin' blind
1: I'm just rollin' no destination no point or time
2: I'm lost, tryna find out which way is up
3: And get what I can get before my days is up
4: My life was rough, but fuck it shit it could've been worse
5: I'm free, when I could be in jail or a hearse
6: Most folks look at my lifestyle and say that I'm blessed
7: They see my smiles they don't see all the heartache and the stress
8: They don't see our hoes and foes pretend to be your friend
9: They love you and down for you 'til your cash flow in
10: When shit switch they split quick to treat you like a stranger
11: Then your hangin' like a hanger and give you the middle finger
12: Like you done somethin' wrong cause you don't provide 'em with drugs
13: Or do the shit you used to do like payday weigh in the club
14: I'mma show y'all some love if you don't love me
15: It's fair exchange or nothin' ain't no robbery
17: I saw it a million times niggas balled and fall
18: I witness boys on they feet kneeled down and crawl
19: I know nothin' lasts forever everything must end
20: Losers live for the day and the future planners win
21: But at the same time, niggas grind and shine
22: We live in danger who's to say tomorrow we won't be dyin'
23: What's the use of workin' hard if you can't display
24: What's the use of bein' a baller if you can't go play
25: It's a lotta ups and downs, smiles and frowns
26: One day you're here the next day you're gone
27: I used to dream of gettin' money rockin' diamonds that blind
28: Nowadays I wish and pray, for a peace of mind
29: I was safer when I was broke I had to dodge less snakes
30: When you got some, you don't know who's real or fake
31: Every day my heart aches from the drama that unfolds
32: This world cold, I'm tryna find my soul
34: I'm tryna stay focused, keep both eyes open
35: Stay on top before my career starts slopin'
36: Ain't no time for jokin' no time for chokin'
37: They wanna see me broken I know what they hopin'
38: Writin' rhymes 'til my pen starts smokin'
39: Makin' sure hot lines are spoken I got the token
40: To the game, and it's my job to claim
41: The fortune and the fame that the industry bring
42: It's simple and plain, those that work hard share profit
43: Nobody can stop it you can't stop 'til you got it
44: I'mma do what I wanna do, live like I wanna live
45: Spend what I wanna spend yield what I wanna yield
46: That's how it is I'm controllin' my fate
47: And shinin' on those who hate to see me live great
48: I'm snatchin' my plate, takin' my steak and eatin' good
49: I suggest you do the same and get the fuck out the hood
title: So Lost
